title: Markets Update: Investor Sentiment Improves as Lockdowns Lift
description: Tony Pasquariello, global head of hedge fund coverage for Goldman Sachs’ Global Markets Division, provides an update on how investors are reacting to the gradual re-opening of the U.S. economy, historic government stimulus efforts, potential vaccine developments, and ongoing US-China tensions.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
